page.title: 14LEISURE SURVEY 1
page.content: Questionaires were completed by parents of children at the Linthurst First School, Blackwell, Bromsgrove. 1.LEISURE ACTIVITIES In all 35 different leisure activities were mentioned in answer to the qusetion "what do you like doing when you are not at work?" Gardening with 25 mentions was the most popular, followed by reading with 17, relaxing 15, walking 11, craftwork 9, socialzing 8, horse riding 6. When grouped together sport was mentioned 19 times <the most popular being swimming>, travel 6, DIY/cooking etc 7,creative activities 7. Surprisingly watching TV was mentioned only 4 times
